brand.description: Connecting coffee lovers with exceptional producers around the world.

home.title: Exceptional coffee sourced directly from passionate producers
home.content: Discover unique flavors every month while directly supporting small coffee producers around the world.

why_us.title: Why SmilingCups?
why_us.subtitle: More than just a coffee subscription, an experience that connects people
why_us.quality_desc: Each bean is carefully selected by expert tasters.
why_us.impact_desc: Your purchase directly supports small producers and their families.
why_us.origins_desc: Explore flavors from over 30 different countries every month

plans.title: Subscription Plans

testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of coffee lovers enjoy SmilingCups every day.
testimonials.customer1_quote: "The most incredible coffee I've ever tasted. Every month is a new adventure in flavors."
testimonials.customer2_quote: "Knowing that I am directly supporting producers makes every cup special."
testimonials.customer3_quote: "La calidad es excepcional y el servicio al cliente es inmejorable. Totalmente recomendado."
